title: CLEO BRAIN Learning Memory Schema
description: Schema for learning memory entries. Runtime store is SQLite (brain_learnings table). JSONL format is used for export/import portability. See ADR-009 Section 3.2.

source.description: Source of the insight (e.g., task completion analysis, blocker patterns).

actionable.description: Whether this insight has a concrete actionable recommendation.

application.description: How to apply this insight in future work.

applicableTypes.description: Task types this insight applies to.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the learning was recorded.
